About Me

Hello, I'm James and I enjoy building user interfaces. I am a self-taught developer before I took a training at Zuitt Coding Bootcamp where I learned full-stack development (MERN).

I'm currently focused on improving my front-end skills, building some personal projects, and learning more about the JavaScript ecosystem.
